title: Font Identification Help
content:
Hello,

Some time ago, I've created the diagram below and now I have to make some changes in it, but I can't remember what font I used. Could you please help? Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021023539im_/http:/typophile.com/files/V_Cycle_Build_blocks_present_0120-Copy1_5028.JPG)
author: x_p_m

comments.content: Yes - That's it - Thanks a lot!
